column42: I think that not all residents have the habit of separating garbage, my apt mates for example do not usually wash the food from packagings. I use to wash the packages before placing in the recycling bin, but I realized that they end up putting packaging with leftover food all mixed.  Another thing Id like to add is about cleaning. Since we dont have drains on the bathroom floor nor in the kitchen, its difficult to wash the floors. So we are required to use strong chemicals to clean them properly, and its not environmental friendly.
